name: Typing of the Dab
description:
My entry for the MoonCord game jam hosted by MoonMoon_OW

A "typing of the dead" inspired typing game where you play as Yung Dab.

Game created by   @Slapunas and @Jakayaki 
Also huge thanks to all the streamers that gave us permissions to source their streams and use their voice lines for the characters. 

This game was made from scratch in 88 hours.
